channel.title: Running
channel.description: hey i have downloaded deathlypvpz source and client i have made some changes and now when i run the server it give me this [IMG]http://i49.tinypic.com/503ceo.png[/img] how to fix it?

item.title: Running
item.dc:creator: @Doobage Doobage
item.description:
@Doobage wrote:

"C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.7.0_10\bin/java.exe" -Xmx1300m -cp deps/data/CompiledFiles;deps/poi.jar;deps/mysql.jar;deps/RuneTopListV2.jar;deps/mina.jar;deps/slf4j.jar;deps/slf4j-nop.jar;deps/jython.jar;log4j-1.2.15.jar; server.Server

change the “-Xmx1300m” to -Xmx512m

click run, see if it works.

Read full topic

item.title: Running
item.dc:creator: @Iyal1234 Iyal1234
item.description:
@Iyal1234 wrote:

hh i wasnt like this before i could run it but i got ram:2gb
32-bit 2.70ghz 2.70 ghz

@echo off title Deeply Source, Running color 70 echo Deeply Starting, do not close! "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.7.0_10\bin/java.exe" -Xmx1300m -cp deps/data/CompiledFiles;deps/poi.jar;deps/mysql.jar;deps/RuneTopListV2.jar;deps/mina.jar;deps/slf4j.jar;deps/slf4j-nop.jar;deps/jython.jar;log4j-1.2.15.jar; server.Server pause
done so how to fix that?

Read full topic

item.title: Running
item.dc:creator: @xxx123xxx xxx123xxx
item.description:
@xxx123xxx wrote:

Well first, find out how much total memory (ram) your computer has. It looks like you have windows seven
So, go to Start>Right click ‘Computer’>click properties, a window should appear and look how much Installed memory (ram) you have.

Post how much you have along with the contents of your batch file (whatever.bat that you use to run your server, right click it and push edit or open it with notepad or wordpad and then copy all of it and post it here)

Read full topic
